paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant V122I, including penetrance data and individual case details.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Heart failure with symptoms including dyspnea and edema.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The patient reported worsening dyspnea with mild exertion, bilateral lower extremity edema, and orthopnea in December 2021.

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with amyloid deposition and cardiac dysfunction.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was confirmed by serum TTR genotyping.
key_quotes: serum TTR genotyping confirmed a heterozygous V122I allelic variant.
The presence of monoclonal gammopathy prompted a hematology evaluation in May 2022.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward with clear information on the TTR variant.
